message.name: ERR_XFV_CREATE
message.locale: You do not have appeal creation rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_READ
message.locale: You do not have appeal read rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_MAINTAIN
message.locale: You do not have appeal maintenance rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_APPROVE
message.locale: You do not have appeal approval rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_DECISION
message.locale: You do not have appeal decision approval rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_LOCATION
message.locale: You do not have appeal rights for this location. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_XFV_SENSITIVITY
message.locale: You do not have appeal rights for this level of participant sensitivity. Please contact your security administrator.
